name: It’s in Your Blood: Understanding Warm
short_description: With fall already upon us and winter on the horizon, you’re preparing your home for the cold weather to come. You have thick blankets and jackets stacked in every corner. You scheduled a heat pump installation to ensure that your home is filled with cozy, warm air throughout the cold seasons. As cold as you feel on the outside, your internal temperature actually stays relatively the same—around 98.6 degrees Fahrenheit—because you’re a warm-blooded mammal. But what does blood have to do with how you feel?
summary: With fall already upon us and winter on the horizon
